articles.title: Canara Bank announces Rs 16.10 dividend, check record and payment dates - Zee Business
articles.description: According to a regulatory filing, the record Date for payment of dividend will be June 17 and the payment of dividend is subject to the approval of shareholders at the ensuing annual general meeting of the bank.
articles.content:
State-owned lender Canara Bank's board of directors on Wednesday, May 8, recommended a final dividend of Rs 16.10 per equity share for FY24, according to a stock market disclosure.
